subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets' chances depend largely on whether Vince Carter and Richard Jefferson can beat Dwyane Wade to the basket and on how well they deal with Shaquille O'Neal once they get there.
snippet: The Nets' chances depend largely on whether Vince Carter and Richard Jefferson can beat Dwyane Wade to the basket and on how well they deal with Shaquille O'Neal once they get there.
